item.title: Interface Troubles
item.dc:creator: @9d_n_1_n_e 9d n 1 n e
item.description:
@9d_n_1_n_e wrote:

[quote=“TRiLeZ, post:1, topic:279027”]Im making an admin commands interface from this one book interface, but I dont know how to add text. I know how to add text for interface 8134 but im wondering how to add text for all interfaces.

sendQuest(“Bla bla bla”, 8147<<Is that the line or something?);

Anybody know what Im saying?

If anyone could help me out by getting my code to work…

public void AdminCommands() { sendQuest("@gre@Admin Commands", ????); clearQuestInterface(); sendQuest("Bla bla bla", ???? ); sendQuestSomething(12624); showInterface(12624); flushOutStream(); }

And also tell me how to figure out how to add text in certain places…[/quote]
that should work.

Read full topic
